title: Enormous 1TB flash drive connects via USB-C and USB-A
description: If your device's hard drive is full, or you want to transfer files quickly, this 512GB USB-C flash drive (with USB-A option) comes in handy. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: If your device's hard drive is full, or you want to transfer files quickly, this 512GB USB-C flash drive (with USB-A option) comes in handy.
text: Daily deals Save 29% on this flash drive with USB-C and USB-A interfaces. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Efficiency and convenience are essential, and a tool like this ginormous 1TB USB-C and USB-A 3.2 flash drive offers both. It’s versatile enough to work with a wide array of devices. And although it’s tiny enough to put in your pocket, it offers plenty of backup space. Even better, this 1TB USB-C flash drive is on sale for just $74.97 (regularly $109.99) for a limited time. A 1TB USB-C flash drive designed for accessibility and easy transfers With 1TB of storage space and both USB-C and USB-A connectors, this flash drive comes in incredibly handy in a variety of situations. It supports both traditional USB devices and newer gadgets with USB-C ports, from the latest iPhones, MacBooks, iPads and Android phones and tablets, to older PCs, smart TVs and even some car stereos. Just flip to the appropriate connector to use the flash drive with whatever compatible device you want. Though it can hold a massive 1TB of data, this dual-USB flash drive is tiny, just as you’d expect from a thumb drive. It measures just 4.29 inches by 3.12 inches by 0.98 inches. And it weighs just 3.84 ounces. If you skimped on storage when you bought your Apple gear, dirt-cheap cloud storage isn’t your only option. This 1TB USB-C thumb drive is a streamlined option for expanding your device’s capabilities or backing up big, important files. Fast transfer speeds will save you time when you need to move large files This 1TB flash drive can significantly enhance your work efficiency. It offers fast data-transfer speeds of between 20 and 30 Mbps, allowing users to transfer large files like high-resolution videos and photos or bulky documents in a fraction of the time it would take with older USB 2.0 drives. (USB-A 3.2 is approximately 10 times faster than its predecessor, USB 2.0.) That’s crucial when you’re transferring the kind of large files this 512GB flash drive was built to handle. Say goodbye to inefficiency! Great for photographers, videographers or anybody who needs to transfer large files quickly Speedy transfers prove helpful for those in creative fields like photography or design who regularly need to move files among multiple devices and platforms without dealing with wait times or bringing additional connectors. This highly portable plug-and-play flash drive sports a durable, high-quality metal case to protect its interior and advanced chip technology. It is also waterproof and dustproof, and capable of withstanding accidental drops and falls. Save on an aluminum 1TB USB-C flash drive Take advantage of this 31% discount and update your tech arsenal with a flash drive that promises speed, versatility, durability and convenience. Get this 1TB USB-C and USB-A 3.2 High-Speed Flash Drive on sale for just $74.97. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. html:
• Daily deals

Efficiency and convenience are essential, and a tool like this ginormous 1TB USB-C and USB-A 3.2 flash drive offers both. It’s versatile enough to work with a wide array of devices. And although it’s tiny enough to put in your pocket, it offers plenty of backup space.

Even better, this 1TB USB-C flash drive is on sale for just $74.97 (regularly $109.99) for a limited time.

A 1TB USB-C flash drive designed for accessibility and easy transfers

With 1TB of storage space and both USB-C and USB-A connectors, this flash drive comes in incredibly handy in a variety of situations. It supports both traditional USB devices and newer gadgets with USB-C ports, from the latest iPhones, MacBooks, iPads and Android phones and tablets, to older PCs, smart TVs and even some car stereos. Just flip to the appropriate connector to use the flash drive with whatever compatible device you want.

Though it can hold a massive 1TB of data, this dual-USB flash drive is tiny, just as you’d expect from a thumb drive. It measures just 4.29 inches by 3.12 inches by 0.98 inches. And it weighs just 3.84 ounces.

If you skimped on storage when you bought your Apple gear, dirt-cheap cloud storage isn’t your only option. This 1TB USB-C thumb drive is a streamlined option for expanding your device’s capabilities or backing up big, important files.

Fast transfer speeds will save you time when you need to move large files

This 1TB flash drive can significantly enhance your work efficiency. It offers fast data-transfer speeds of between 20 and 30 Mbps, allowing users to transfer large files like high-resolution videos and photos or bulky documents in a fraction of the time it would take with older USB 2.0 drives. (USB-A 3.2 is approximately 10 times faster than its predecessor, USB 2.0.)

That’s crucial when you’re transferring the kind of large files this 512GB flash drive was built to handle. Say goodbye to inefficiency!

Great for photographers, videographers or anybody who needs to transfer large files quickly

Speedy transfers prove helpful for those in creative fields like photography or design who regularly need to move files among multiple devices and platforms without dealing with wait times or bringing additional connectors.

This highly portable plug-and-play flash drive sports a durable, high-quality metal case to protect its interior and advanced chip technology. It is also waterproof and dustproof, and capable of withstanding accidental drops and falls.

Save on an aluminum 1TB USB-C flash drive

Take advantage of this 31% discount and update your tech arsenal with a flash drive that promises speed, versatility, durability and convenience. Get this 1TB USB-C and USB-A 3.2 High-Speed Flash Drive on sale for just $74.97.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deals post on the 1TB USB-C flash drive with USB-A option on May 21, 2024. We updated the pricing.
